languages.text: "Но теперь-то благодаря вам все стало на свои места — дверка опять приоткрыта, и шепотки родименькие меня снова ласково терзают". {n}Псайкер горько усмехается.{/n} "Я, собственно, не только сопли благодарственные распускать пришла — дело есть важное обсудить, как раз касаемо шепотков моих. Я видения всякие начала видеть интересные... И, кажется, от того как мы с ними обойдемся, судьба моя зависеть будет. Знаю, звучит драматично, но я на полном серьезе."

traits.locale_text: "Но теперь-то благодаря вам все стало на свои места — дверка опять приоткрыта, и шепотки родименькие меня снова ласково терзают". {n}Псайкер горько усмехается и постукивает себя кулаком по лбу.{/n} "Я, собственно, не только сопли благодарственные распускать пришла — дело есть важное обсудить, как раз касаемо шепотков моих. Разрешите?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious."
languages.original_text: "Но теперь-то благодаря вам все стало на свои места — дверка опять приоткрыта, и шепотки родименькие меня снова ласково терзают". {n}Псайкер горько усмехается.{/n} "Я, собственно, не только сопли благодарственные распускать пришла — дело есть важное обсудить, как раз касаемо шепотков моих. Я видения всякие начала видеть интересные... И, кажется, от того как мы с ними обойдемся, судьба моя зависеть будет. Знаю, звучит драматично, но я на полном серьезе."

traits.locale_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and the dear old whispers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. May I?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and the dear old whispers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. May I?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious. When you have a moment, call me over on the bridge, all right?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious. When you have a moment, call me over on the bridge, all right?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “好吧，多亏了你，一切又变回了原来的样子。那扇门又裂开了，我那群亲爱的低语声又回来折磨我了，那群混蛋。”{n}她苦涩地笑了起来。{/n}“不过，我并不是来抱怨这些的。我来这里有很重要的事情，是关于那些低语声的。我最近一直都在看到某些有趣的幻象……我认为，我们对待这些幻象的态度会决定我的命运。我知道这听起来很玄乎，但我是认真的。”
languages.original_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，多亏了你，一切又变回了原来的样子。那扇门又裂开了，我那群亲爱的低语声又回来折磨我了，那群混蛋。”{n}她苦涩地笑了起来。{/n}“不过，我并不是来抱怨这些的。我来这里有很重要的事情，是关于那些低语声的。我最近一直都在看到某些有趣的幻象……我认为，我们对待这些幻象的态度会决定我的命运。我知道这听起来很玄乎，但我是认真的。等你有空的时候，把我叫到舰桥上来谈谈，好吧？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Bueno, gracias a usted, las cosas están como siempre: la puerta vuelve a estar abierta y mis queridos susurros han vuelto para seguir torturándome, los muy gamberros». {n}Se ríe con amargura.{/n} «En realidad no he venido solo para darle las gracias entre lágrimas. Tengo que contarle algo importante sobre mis susurros. Verá, he tenido unas visiones interesantes... y creo que lo que me han mostrado puede decidir mi destino. Sé que suena dramático, pero hablo muy en serio».
languages.original_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, gracias a usted, las cosas están como siempre: la puerta vuelve a estar abierta y mis queridos susurros han vuelto para seguir torturándome, los muy gamberros». {n}Se ríe con amargura.{/n} «En realidad no he venido solo para darle las gracias entre lágrimas. Tengo que contarle algo importante sobre mis susurros. Verá, he tenido unas visiones interesantes... y creo que lo que me han mostrado puede decidir mi destino. Sé que suena dramático, pero hablo muy en serio. Cuando tenga un momento, avíseme en el puente, ¿de acuerdo?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, dank Euch ist wieder alles wie immer. Die Tür steht wieder offen und meine lieben alten Flüsterer sind wieder da, um mich zu foltern, die kleinen Halunken." {n}Sie lacht verbittert auf.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, ich bin nicht nur hergekommen, um Euch tränenreich zu danken. Es geht um etwas Wichtiges, um mein Geflüster. Wisst Ihr, ich habe interessante Visionen ... Und ich habe das Gefühl, dass es über mein Schicksal entscheidet, wie wir mit diesen Visionen umgehen. Ich weiß, es klingt dramatisch, aber ich meine es todernst."
languages.original_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, dank Euch ist wieder alles wie immer. Die Tür steht wieder offen und meine lieben alten Flüsterer sind wieder da, um mich zu foltern, die kleinen Halunken." {n}Sie lacht verbittert auf.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, ich bin nicht nur hergekommen, um Euch tränenreich zu danken. Es geht um etwas Wichtiges, um mein Geflüster. Wisst Ihr, ich habe interessante Visionen ... Und ich habe das Gefühl, dass es über mein Schicksal entscheidet, wie wir mit diesen Visionen umgehen. Ich weiß, es klingt dramatisch, aber ich meine es todernst. Wenn Ihr mal einen Augenblick habt, ruft mich auf die Brücke, ja?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「まあ、陛下のおかげで何もかも元通りになったわ。扉はまた開け放たれたし、あたいのやんちゃな囁く者たちも戻ってきたしね。まるであたいをいじめたいみたい」{n}彼女は苦笑いする。{/n}「あのね、あたいがここへ来たのは、こんな涙目になって感謝するためだけじゃないの。あたいの囁きについて、大事なことを話したくて。実は面白いビジョンを見ているのよ…そしてそのビジョンにどう向き合うかが運命を決めるような気がするの。大げさに聞こえるかもしれないけど、あたいは真剣よ」
languages.original_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、陛下のおかげで何もかも元通りになったわ。扉はまた開け放たれたし、あたいのやんちゃな囁く者たちも戻ってきたしね。まるであたいをいじめたいみたい」{n}彼女は苦笑いする。{/n}「あのね、あたいがここへ来たのは、こんな涙目になって感謝するためだけじゃないの。あたいの囁きについて、大事なことを話したくて。実は面白いビジョンを見ているのよ…そしてそのビジョンにどう向き合うかが運命を決めるような気がするの。大げさに聞こえるかもしれないけど、あたいは真剣よ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Eh bien, grâce à vous, tout est redevenu comme avant... La porte est de nouveau entrouverte et mes chers petits murmures sont revenus me torturer, {n}dit-elle en laissant échapper un petit rire amer.{/n} Mais je ne suis pas venue ici pour vous tirer des larmes et vous remercier. J'ai quelque chose d'important à vous apprendre au sujet de mes murmures. J'ai reçu d'intéressantes visions ces derniers temps... Et je sens que mon destin dépendra de la façon dont nous y réagirons. Je sais que cela peut vous paraître exagéré, mais je suis on ne peut plus sérieuse. »
languages.original_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, grâce à vous, tout est redevenu comme avant... La porte est de nouveau entrouverte et mes chers petits murmures sont revenus me torturer, {n}dit-elle en laissant échapper un petit rire amer.{/n} Mais je ne suis pas venue ici pour vous tirer des larmes et vous remercier. J'ai quelque chose d'important à vous apprendre au sujet de mes murmures. J'ai reçu d'intéressantes visions ces derniers temps... Et je sens que mon destin dépendra de la façon dont nous y réagirons. Je sais que cela peut vous paraître exagéré, mais je suis on ne peut plus sérieuse. Convoquez-moi sur la passerelle lorsque vous aurez un moment à me consacrer, vous voulez bien ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Senin sayende işler rayına oturdu. Kapı yeniden açıldı ve sevgili fısıldayanlarım, yaramazlarım yeniden bana eziyet etmeye başladı." {n}Acıyla kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Buraya sızlanıp sana duyduğum minnettarlığı göstermeye gelmedim. Fısıltılarımla ilgili önemli bir mesele var. Bazı ilginç görüler görüyordum. Bence bu görülerle başa çıkma şeklimiz benim kaderimi belirleyecek. Kulağa dramatik geldiğinin farkında olmakla birlikte çok ciddiyim."
languages.original_text: "Well, thanks to you, things are back to the way they've always been — the door's cracked open again, and my dear old whisperers are back to torture me, the rascals." {n}She chuckles bitterly.{/n} "You know, I didn't come here just to get all teary-eyed and grateful on you. It's something important, something about my whispers. See, I've been having some interesting visions... And I feel like how we deal with those visions is going to decide my fate. I know it sounds dramatic, but I'm being dead serious."

traits.locale_text: "Senin sayende işler rayına oturdu. Kapı yeniden açıldı ve sevgili fısıldayanlarım, o serseriler bana eziyet etmek için geri döndüler." {n}Acıyla kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Buraya sızlanıp sana duyduğum minnettarlığı göstermek için gelmedim. Önemli bir şey var, fısıltılarımla ilgili. Bazı ilginç görüler görüyordum. Bence bu görülerle nasıl başa çıktığımız, benim kaderimi belirleyecek. Kulağa dramatik geldiğinin farkındayım ama çok ciddiyim."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
